title: Strengthening Social Domain Expertise through Learner Responsibility and Collaborative Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced knowledge in social sciences and relevant professional experience
context.additional_context: An in-depth social studies program for working professionals, requiring the implementation of a learner-led participation and shared responsibility model between instructors and learners

learning_goals: Learners concretely outline learning goals and responsibility execution plans through weekly reflective journals
Learners improve learning strategies by over 80% following peer feedback and instructor-structured guidance
Learners revise learner-instructor collaborative design principle applications in final projects at least three times
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
